summary: This document is an email or calendar invitation for a briefing conference call scheduled for October 23, 2020, to discuss logistical and preparatory items for an event or meeting related to the Epstein case, including RSVPs, packet contents for the DOJ, and refreshments funding.

persons.name: EFTA00152851
persons.context: Appears to be the sender/organizer of the briefing conference call invitation, signing off the message.

events.title: Epstein Briefing Conference Call
events.description: A scheduled conference call to discuss logistical preparations for an event or meeting, including RSVP status, contents of individualized packets for the DOJ, and refreshments funding.

keyFacts: A briefing conference call related to the Epstein case was scheduled for October 23, 2020.
The call agenda included preparing individualized packets for the Department of Justice (DOJ).
Logistical details such as RSVPs, packet contents, and funding for refreshments were to be discussed.
